Analyze business requirements and collaborate with product owners to deliver original, efficent soltuions.

California Department of Public Health

Provided operational support and development for information exchange interfaces to support CalREDIE electronic case reporting and assisted with electronic lab reporting. Programmed system interfaces based on HL7 standards using Orion Health Rhapsody Integration Engine. Led teams in testing process, monitoring, risk analysis, and potential security issues. Independently researced and sought solutions to problems and contributed to improving workflows.

August 2018 - March 2019

Evaluated systems, analyzed complex issues, tested data and assisted users in reaching a resolution. Maintained system directories, using graphical user interfaces for template building, and performed system administrator duties. Performed daily tasks including Epic Bridges error log, monitoring system status, and teaching proper workflow.

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors. In the winter, I like to snowboard. During the warmer months here in California, I enjoy running, cycling, and hanging out in my backyard.

When forced indoors, I am a huge board game nerd and I like to brew my own beer. Also in my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end web development world.
